Subject: Armour Academy: Scale Armour!
Description: Since the dawn of time, scale armor has been the coolest of all the armors. And now you too can learn how to make it! In this panel, we will teach the basic art of scale mail weaving, and you'll get a chance to try your own hand at creating scale armor!  Speakers include:Alexander Kostrzewa - Track: Costuming  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Armour Academy: Chainmail!
Description: Want to learn how to make chainmail? Well, good news! It's not that hard! Well, kind of hard, but not too bad. In this panel, we will teach the traditional European four-in-one weave, used for armor from the Roman Empire through middle ages, and send you home with a small piece forged by your own hands! Kits can be purchased at Thundersteel Armoury in Artist Alley to participate in this panel, but all are welcome to observe!  Speakers include:Alexander Kostrzewa - Track: Costuming  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Armour Academy: Samurai Edition!
Description:
Want to make your own samurai armor? Well, let's get started! In this panel, we'll look at the construction of Japanese Kusari â€“ a mesh armor similar to but distinct from European chainmail. During the course of the panel, we'll teach you the basic So Kusari and Hana Kusari patterns, and send you home with a small piece of your very own!
Kits can be purchased at Thundersteel Armoury in the artists alley to participate in this panel, but all are welcome to observe!  Speakers include:Alexander Kostrzewa - Track: Costuming, DIY  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
